biocontainers.name: peakachu
biocontainers.summary: Peak calling tool for CLIP-seq data.

biotools.summary: A supervised learning framework for chromatin loop detection in genome-wide contact maps. It can be used to visualize Hi-C, ChIA-PET, HiCHiP, PLAC-Seq, Capture Hi-C data.

bioschemas.name: Peakachu
bioschemas.summary: A supervised learning framework for chromatin loop detection in genome-wide contact maps. It can be used to visualize Hi-C, ChIA-PET, HiCHiP, PLAC-Seq, Capture Hi-C data.
